IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Provide high quality behavioral health services in a professional environment which is sensitive to individual and community needs and resources. Exercise a leadership role in providing accessible and affordable services to individuals, families and organizations.
IRS990.MissionDescription: Provide high quality behavioral health services in a professional environment which is sensitive to individual and community needs and resources. Exercise a leadership role in providing accessible and affordable services to individuals, families and organizations.
IRS990.Description: Seriously Mentally Ill - Psychiatric Services, Meds. Management, Case Management, Crisis Services and Individual & Group Therapy.

Activity2.Description: Children's Programs - Psychiatric Services, Meds. Management, Case Management, Crisis Services, Child & Family Teams, Family & Group Therapy, In-Home Services and Accute Residential Care.

Activity3.Description: General Mental Health, Alcohol & Drug - Psychiatric Services, Meds. Management, Crisis Services and Individual & Group Therapy

IRS990ScheduleA.FactsAndCircumstancesTest: Gross Rents, Net Income from Sales of Inventory & Miscellaneous

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Revenue and Expenses from Conbined Affiliate.

Form990ScheduleHPartVI.NeedsAssessment: WYGC is active in several community coalitions which provide mechanisims for assessing the needs of the community WYGC studies data gathered through internal and state administered consumer satisfaction surveys statewide health statistics Census data and other reports WYGC holds periodic individual meetings with local stakeholders to ascertain their perception of community needs
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.PatientEducationAssistance: Eligibility & Enrollment staff meet with patients to gather financial information to see if they are eligible for Medicaid Medicare or have Insurance If not and they cant be enrolled in the Government programs the staff have them sign a financial responsibility form and the patients are informed about our Sliding Fee Scale If the patient cannot pay anything we record the service as Charity Care
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.CommunityInformation: Windhaven Psychiatric Hospital provides services to the western portion of Yavapai County based on boundries established by its largest contractor Northern Arizona Regional Behavioral Health Authority The constituents that it services is primarily the indigent population
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.OtherInformation: WYGC approaches community education & outreach as an impoortant part of being a service provider Community access television shows feature staff interviews on WYGC particularly the job training and placement program & the senior wellness & prevention program WYGC hosts a free Recovery Month celebration WYGC clinical leadership are available for mental health training to local law enforcement and education staff

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: The Industrial Dev Auth of Yavapai County
The Industrial Dev Auth of Yavapai County

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: To construct a Beh. Health Clinic

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Page 2, Part III 4d - Psychiatric Hospital, Chemical Dependency Residential and Prevention Page 6, Part VI A. 11a - The Chief Financial Officer presents the 990 to the Board of Directors Finance Committee in detail. The Finance Committee then presents a copy of the 990 to the entire Board for their review and approval before it is filed. Page 6, Part VI B. 12c - Annually the Board of Directors receives training on the Conflict of Interest Policy, each member completes a Questionaire about conflicts of interest and signs an attestation. Page 6, Part VI B 15b - The Organization uses a Salary Survey done periodically by the Arizona Council of Human Service Providers and Guidestar as a guidline for salaries. Page 6, Part VI C. 19 - The Organization makes its governing documents available to the public upon request.

NameOfDisregardedEntity.BusinessNameLine1: West Yavapai Guidance Clinic Foundation Inc
